Introduction: Hi! I'm Jade! I'm always around, ehehe~$1
Divorced: I don't think you know what you're saying...$5
secondChance_Girls: I guess we can try again...$3
Mon: $3I'm going out to look for bugs!$1#$b#You'd think it'd get boring, but they're always doin' cool stuff!$1
Tue: If you ever see a faerie, you have to tell me, okay?$3#$b#That's a promise!$1
Wed: Can you take me into the mines one day? I bet there's lots of cool stuff down there!$1
Thu: I wonder if that wizard takes apprentices...$3
Fri: Can I come look for cool stuff at your farm one day?$1
Sat: I live in the abandoned house in Cindersap Forest.$3#$b#There's lots of spiders, but I don't mind.$1
Sun: I bet Linus sees all kinds of cool stuff... I should ask him!!$1
spring_12: The Egg Festival is tomorrow.#$e#Not my favorite thing, but I like company so I'll be there!$1
spring_23: The Spring Flower Dance is tomorrow, isn't it?#$b#I wish I was a good dancer...$2
summer_Mon: I love summer! Let's make the most of today, @!$1
summer_Wed: Let's get some work done today, @!$1
summer_Sat: I love the heat. I feel at home.$1
summer_Thu: I'd hate to be nocturnal. Who'd wanna miss this sun?$1
summer_Fri: I feel like I'm walking around in blankets. I hope Summer never ends.$1
summer_10: The Luau is tomorrow! I can't wait for some tasty soup.#$e#They yelled at me last time I put ants in there...$1
summer_27: The glowing jellyfish remind me of faeries.#$e#I can't wait to see them.$1
fall_Mon: Aw, winter is starting. At least I get to see the bugs start to hibernate.$2
fall_Tue: It's colder than I'd like, but it just looks so beautiful out.$3
fall_Wed: Please plant some Fairy Roses for me! I really want to see if its true!$1
fall_Thu: Sometimes I jump into piles of leaves just to see how many bugs there are in there.$1#$b#What's with that look?$3
fall_Fri: I can't wait to go home and cuddle up in some blankets.$1#$b#If that mouse didn't chew more holes in them...$3
fall_Sat: I'm no farmer, but it sure seems like a good time for crops! I can feel it in the air.$1
fall_Sun: This weather makes me feel so energized!#$b#It's perfect weather for study!$1
fall_15: I can't wait to play the games at the fair!$1#$e#Even though I usually lose all my gold for the month...$3
fall_26: The Spirit's Eve festival is tomorrow, do you plan on going?#$b#I wanna wear something cute!$1
winter_Tue: I need more hobbies for the winter.#$e#All the bugs are sleeping.$3
winter_Wed: Let's get hot chocolate sometime. I need it. Brr...$2
winter_Sat: The year is almost over. Nature is crazy.$3
winter_Sun: Most the bugs are hiding for the winter...$2
winter_4: It's my birthday! The only good thing about winter!$1
winter_7: I'll never understand the ice festival.#$b#It's just ice, guys!$3
winter_24: The Feast of the Winter Star is tomorrow?#$b#I wonder who's gonna get me a gift...#$b#And what will I get them? So much to think about...$1
stardrop_gift: Darling, I want you to have this... You mean so much to me, thank you for everything.$l
give_flowersA: Y'know, the local tradition with these flowers is...$1#$b#Wait...?$4#$b#Oh! Yes, I'll be your girlfriend! I've wanted to be for a while, ehehe~.$1
give_flowersB: Y'know, the local tradition with these flowers is...$1#$b#Wait...?$4#$b#Oh! Yes, I'll be your girlfriend! I've wanted to be for a while, ehehe~.$1
give_pendant: You... want to marry me?$3#$b#I-... Of course!$4#$b#I'm so happy! I'll set everything up! I can't wait to be yours!$4
reject_two_heartA: Isn't it kinda soon for that...?$4
reject_two_heartB: It's a bit too soon for that, don't you think?$4
reject_four_heartB: Uh... did I give off the wrong signals?$4
engageA: Aren't you engaged? Go get that done first!$1
engageB: You're already engaged, silly. Finish that first and get back to me~$1
marriedA: You're already married, silly.$3#$b#I don't think they've legalized what you want yet!$1
marriedB: Hehe, you're looking for a harem, aren't you?$4

refusal_knownB: I'm sorry. I don't feel the same way...$2
refusal_botherA: I want some alone time, please.$5
prayWithJade: I'm so tired of being alone. I don't even know if you're real. I just... I can't take this alone...$2
